title: Apollo Theaterâ€™s Longtime President Will Step Down
description: Jonelle Procope, who transformed the Harlem organization from a struggling nonprofit to an internationally recognized cultural center, will leave in June after two decades in the role.
dc:creator: Sarah Bahr
media:description: Jonelle Procope, the president and chief executive of the Apollo Theater in Harlem, will step down from the organization in June 2023.
